title: Simplon Pride II aero road bike is new “world’s fastest” within UCI rules, plus Tri version & more!
content:
The new Simplon Pride II overhauls the Austrian aero road bike to fight for the title of “world’s fastest” road bike. With more forgiving UCI regulations, Simplon made the bike more aerodynamic than ever, while also building in much more rider adjustability. There is even a new Pride Tri version that easily converts the bike

The post Simplon Pride II aero road bike is new “world’s fastest” within UCI rules, plus Tri version & more! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
